messages.subject: educationese
messages.msgSnippet: Here s one we could try, on Tuesday a friend and I are being hair models for color and I made dd an appointment for a style then were going to hit the town as
messages.messageBody:
"Here's one we could try, on Tuesday a friend and I are being hair
models for
color and I made dd an appointment for a style then were going to
hit the town
as 3 hot looking women. Surely there's some creative way to put that
into the
lingo?"

I have a couple of things to say about this...first being, don't try
to put all of your life into "educationese" to please ANYONE. Just
live and be joyful and maybe journal about your life.
If you MUST turn in some kind of log book or portfolio, have some
photos, ticket stubs etc... but I think trying to turn every
activity into something schoolish can take something away from that
activity.

On the other hand, being a makeup artist that adores being part of
the fashion world, I would call it fashion design. She's
experimenting with current trends...very important for someone in
the fashion world. :)

Ren
